chart_metadata.name: handbrake
chart_metadata.description: HandBrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Handbrake is able to change file ownership.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Handbrake is able to bypass file read, write, and execute permission checks.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Handbrake is able to bypass permission checks on operations that normally require the file system UID of the process to match the UID of the file.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Handbrake is able to set the setuid attribute on a file.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Handbrake is able to set the setgid attribute on a file.

capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE
capabilities.description: Handbrake is able to bind a socket to internet domain privileged ports (port numbers less than 1024).

capabilities.name: KILL
capabilities.description: Handbrake is able to kill processes.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Handbrake

attrs.label: Dark Mode
attrs.description: Enable dark mode for Handbrake.

attrs.label: VNC Password
attrs.description: The password for the VNC UI.

attrs.label: Secure Connection
attrs.description: Enable secure connection for Handbrake.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Handbrake.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Handbrake files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Handbrake files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Web Port
attrs.description: The port for the Handbrake Web UI.

attrs.label: VNC Port
attrs.description: The port for the Handbrake VNC UI.

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.</br>

attrs.label: Handbrake Config Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Handbrake Configuration.

attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>

SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Handbrake.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Handbrake.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

1.0.3.app_readme:
Handbrake

Handbrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.
1.0.3.detailed_readme:
Handbrake

Handbrake is a tool for converting video from nearly any format to a selection of modern, widely supported codecs.
